name: Café Sidamo Bio
description: 100% Arabica from Ethiopia. From organic farming, this coffee is very sweet; it grows in the Sidamo region in heights between 1400 and 2200 m. This fruity coffee is roasted at the Moulin J.P. Dieschbourg in Echternach (G-D du Luxembourg).

sub_indicators.name: Pesticides
sub_indicators.description: Plant pests and diseases are controlled by using organic cropping techniques while pesticides are reduced to the minimum allowed by official EU organic regulation.

sub_indicators.name: Animal Drug Use
sub_indicators.description: Not applicable

sub_indicators.name: Community-supported
sub_indicators.description: No evidence

sub_indicators.name: Product Diversification
sub_indicators.description: No evidence

sub_indicators.name: Farmer Cooperative
sub_indicators.description: Fairtrade® certification guidelines are followed to support producer sovereignty, specifically by working with farmer cooperatives as well as using the Fairtrade® guidelines to set up the price policy.

sub_indicators.name: Community-investment
sub_indicators.description: By following EU organic and Fairtrade® regulations at the coffee production sites, Moulin Dieschbourg supports the local economy in Sidoma, Ethiopia.

sub_indicators.name: Local Procurement
sub_indicators.description: No evidence

sub_indicators.name: Local Workforce
sub_indicators.description: By following the criteria of the Label Made in Luxembourg, Moulin Dieschbourg guarantees a coffee that is 100% roasted in Echternach, Luxembourg, thus supporting local craftsmanship and employment. Furthermore, the company is part of the association Mellerdaler Regionalproduzenten.

sub_indicators.name: Employment Relations
sub_indicators.description: Workers' rights and duties are embedded in internal management systems with right to information

sub_indicators.name: Right of Negotiation
sub_indicators.description: Coffee producers are organised in cooperations that meet every three months with Douwe Egberts country representatives to engage in discu

sub_indicators.name: Forced Labour
sub_indicators.description: Douwe Egberts installed an enterprise-unique, independently controlled policy to strictly forbid and punish all types of forced labour.

sub_indicators.name: Child Labour
sub_indicators.description: National laws in the coffee production countries are followed to avoid child labour as much as possible.
